name: Creamy Dill Pickle Popcorn
description: Microwave popcorn bags have added chemicals and can be packed with artery clogging saturated fats. Our Steamer makes it easy to know what’s in your food.
preparation: Place popcorn in a Rectangular Steamer, cover with lid, and microwave on high for 2–3 minutes.
Drizzle olive oil over popped popcorn. Season with seasoning.
tips: Try popcorn in a salad! For a gluten-free Caesar salad, replace croutons with Popcorn

products.name: Creamy Dill Popcorn Seasoning
summary: Take your popcorn to the next level with Creamy Dill!

products.name: Rectangular Steamer
summary: Easy to clean. Easy to serve. Rectangular, silicone steamer is perfect for side dishes & desserts.
